[Task Description]
You will be given DIALOGUE CONTEXT and MEMORY.
Your job is to judge if MEMORY contains helpful past information for a language model, representing Unknown, to generate a proper next response based on DIALOGUE CONTEXT.

If the DIALOUGE CONTEXT does not require the model to utilize past information for response generation, say "N/A".
Say "Yes" if MEMORY contains such helpful information and say "No" if it dose not.
Provide a brief explanation for your judgement.

[Format Regulation]
Generate your output below OUTPUT using the following format:
Brief explanation: your explanation
Judgement: "Yes", "No", or "N/A"

[Task]
DIALOGUE CONTEXT:
We watched Miracle at the weekend like you suggested, we all really enjoyed it!
I'm glad you liked it. My kids love pretty much every Disney movie but my husband loved it, too. What else have you been up to?

[MEMORY]
Related Evidences: (1) {'Related Topics': 'Recent Movies', 'Related Summaries': 'Speaker A and Speaker B talk about recent movies they have watched.', 'Related Dialogues': '### Speaker A: Have you seen any new romance movies lately? ### Speaker B: I haven't, my family has been so busy that I have not had a minute to sit and relax. Have you seen any new Disney movies recently? ### Speaker A: Yes, I have seen a new Disney movie lately it is called Luca. Have you seen it?  ### Speaker B: No, I haven't. I did see that my kids were watching it the other day and they said it was really good. Did you like it? ### Speaker A: It was a really good movie. Really cute movie. I enjoyed watching it. What Disney movies have you seen lately? ### Speaker B: I haven't had a lot of time for movies lately but the last Disney movie we watched as a family was Miracle, my husband really enjoys the Disney sports movies.' }(2) {'Related Topics': 'Movie Recommendations', 'Related Summaries': 'Speaker A and Speaker B recommend movies to each other.', 'Related Dialogues': '### Speaker A: I have never heard of the Miracle movie what is that about?
